CODE             	LONG DESCRIPTION            	SHORT DESCRIPTION    
0            	RATINGS SHOWN BY 1ST 2 DIGITS    	NONE                       
1            	STUDENT AIRPLANE OR HELICOPTER   	STAH                       
2            	STUD GLIDER/LIGHTER THAN AIR     	STGL                       
3            	INSTRUMENT                       	INST                       
4            	LIGHTER THAN AIR                 	LTA                        
5            	LIGHTER THAN AIR & INSTRUMENT    	LTAI                       
6            	NOT USED                        	                           
7            	NOT USED                        	                          
8            	FOREIGN                          	FORN                      
9            	UNKNOWN                          	UNKN                       
99999        	OTHER RATE INVALID               	ERROR MESSAGE
